subject: Steroids
Football
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.  asked the Supreme Court to overturn the decision that allowed two Minnesota Vikings defensive linemen to challenge their four-game suspensions for violating the league’s antidrug policy.
snippet: The N.F.L.  asked the Supreme Court to overturn the decision that allowed two Minnesota Vikings defensive linemen to challenge their four-game suspensions for violating the league’s antidrug policy.
